metadata.title: Climate Culture Index 2025
metadata.sample_description: US adults, quota-matched on age group, gender, and ethnicity
metadata.weighting_method: 5-step iterative raking (age x gender x race, geography, SES, ethnicity, politics + SASSY segments) with weight trimming (0.2-5.0)

indicators.ee: Belief that others are engaging in the behavior
indicators.pnb: Belief that others should engage in the behavior
indicators.ne: Belief that others think people should engage in the behavior
indicators.policy.info: Openness to learn about the policy

policy_descriptions.ev: State upfront cash rebate for EV purchase or lease
policy_descriptions.solar: Utility buys excess electricity from solar panels (net metering)
policy_descriptions.community.solar: Guarantee at least 5% annual savings on electricity bill
policy_descriptions.offset: Federal requirement for travel providers to offer carbon offsets
policy_descriptions.hp: State upfront cash rebate for heat pump installation
policy_descriptions.beef: State increases plant-based meal options in state-run facilities
policy_descriptions.fw: Federal uniform food date labeling system
